---
title: Teaching
---

<div style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/09/YouTube_full-color_icon_%282017%29.svg/1024px-YouTube_full-color_icon_%282017%29.svg.png" alt="YouTube" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: middle;" id="youtube-icon"> = Available on YouTube
<span style="margin-left: 1rem;">
<button onclick="exportToCSV()" style="padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem; font-size: 0.875rem; cursor: pointer; background: #f5f5f5; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 4px;">Export CSV</button>
<button onclick="exportToTXT()" style="padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem; font-size: 0.875rem; cursor: pointer; background: #f5f5f5; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 4px; margin-left: 0.5rem;">Export TXT</button>
<button onclick="exportToJSON()" style="padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem; font-size: 0.875rem; cursor: pointer; background: #f5f5f5; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 4px; margin-left: 0.5rem;">Export JSON</button>
</span>
</div>

<ul id="course-list"></ul>

<script>
let courses = [];
const youtubeIconHtml = '<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/09/YouTube_full-color_icon_%282017%29.svg/1024px-YouTube_full-color_icon_%282017%29.svg.png" alt="YouTube" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: middle;">';

async function loadCourses() {
  const response = await fetch('teaching.json');
  courses = await response.json();
  renderCourses();
}

function renderCourses() {
  const list = document.getElementById('course-list');
  list.innerHTML = '';
  courses.forEach(course => {
    const li = document.createElement('li');
    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = course.url;
    link.textContent = course.name;
    li.appendChild(link);
    if (course.youtube) {
      li.innerHTML += ' ' + youtubeIconHtml;
    }
    list.appendChild(li);
  });
}

function exportToCSV() {
  let csv = "Course,URL,YouTube\n";
  courses.forEach(c => {
    csv += `"${c.name}","${c.url}","${c.youtube ? 'Yes' : 'No'}"\n`;
  });
  downloadFile(csv, "teaching.csv", "text/csv");
}

function exportToTXT() {
  let txt = "Teaching - Course List\n" + "=".repeat(50) + "\n\n";
  courses.forEach(c => {
    txt += `${c.name}${c.youtube ? ' ðŸŽ¥' : ''}\n${c.url}\n\n`;
  });
  downloadFile(txt, "teaching.txt", "text/plain");
}

function exportToJSON() {
  downloadFile(JSON.stringify(courses, null, 2), "teaching.json", "application/json");
}

function downloadFile(content, filename, type) {
  const blob = new Blob([content], { type: type });
  const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
  const a = document.createElement("a");
  a.href = url;
  a.download = filename;
  document.body.appendChild(a);
  a.click();
  document.body.removeChild(a);
  URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
}

loadCourses();
</script>
